scripts.build: rimraf ./build && npm run generate && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && copyfiles ./{generated,images}/** ./build
scripts.generate: npm run generate-schema && npm run generate-sass
scripts.generate-schema: json2ts mac-schema.json generated/mac.d.ts --no-additionalProperties && replace-in-file "/\[k: string\]: unknown;/g" "" generated/mac.d.ts --isRegex
